This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Considering its exceptional quality and functionality, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $99. Don't miss out on this chance to own something truly remarkable. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $99.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $99
